last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: While attending a climate change conference at Calgary, Tom realises that his best friends could be his enemies. With the clock ticking, Tom has to make a decision based on the type of information that could kill people.

name: Burn Up
overview: An oil industrialist, an environmental activist and a politician are in conflict in this drama set around a summit on climate change.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When the head of Arrow Oil retires unexpectedly, Tom McConnell (Rupert Penry-Jones) is asked to replace him. A group of oil workers in the Saudi desert are murdered but one worker excapes with the data from the survey. Arrow Oil is served a writ for destroying the lives of the Arctic Inuit.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: While attending a climate change conference at Calgary, Tom realises that his best friends could be his enemies. With the clock ticking, Tom has to make a decision based on the type of information that could kill people.
